data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 928 believers in the state of Pristina to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pristina, Kosovo
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Pristina unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 514 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Pristina, Kosovo to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Pristina, Kosovo to the gospel today.
Jesus, I pray that all the Gorani people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Gorani people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Gorani people is yours.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Pristina to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Pristina, Kosovo.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.section_summary:
the state of Pristina, Kosovo has a population of 477,300.

We estimate Pristina has 928 people who might know Jesus, 18,946 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 457,425 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 514 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Pristina.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
